unnormalised: Okay, so return policies, right? Always a bit of a hassle! Remember that saree I bought online before Diwali from that shop in Delhi? Colour was off. Thankfully, they took it back. Easy returns are key! Like, even easier than making biryani on a lazy Sunday afternoon. Rajeev got stuck with something similar near Kochi during Onam, return window had closed! Major sad face!
